tier.item: b. ¯bo na Athpare Rai-chi-ha bhOEsOE bistOEri bistOEri ma~"-sa
now DEM A. R.-ns-N language slowly slowly lose-CONV go-INC[3sS]
ika bh¯ne na-kha-ek-kha piccha-chi-³a ³ke-ri³ cek-ma
`Now the language of the Athpare Rais is slowly getting lost. This is because
the local children don't know how to speak our language.'
(lit., `... Why I say so? -- the children from here don't know ...')
